channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Finally! Google Flights adds ability to filter out basic economy, launching flight deals
item.description: Google is rolling out some great new features to its popular Google Flights pages, including (finally) the ability to screen out basic economy fares i...

item.title: LaGuardia and Newark just got a surprising new airline — and flights to Bermuda
item.description: BermudAir is moving its New York operations to the LaGuardia and Newark airports.

item.title: Chase Sapphire Reserve’s 100K bonus: Last chance for best-ever offer
item.description: The Chase Sapphire Reserve is currently offering 100,000 Ultimate Rewards points — here's what you should know if you're considering applying.

item.title: How to redeem your points with the Southwest Rapid Rewards program
item.description: Southwest Airlines' Rapid Rewards program gives you many ways to redeem points, but how do you do this, and what are the best options?

item.title: Deal alert: Save up to 50% on Amazon purchases using just 1 Amex point
item.description: Turn 1 American Express Membership Rewards point into big savings on Amazon thanks to this offer available to some shoppers.
